## Diagrams with GraphViz

GraphViz supports various diagram types:

```{dot}
digraph BookWorkflow {
    rankdir=LR;
    Authoring -> Production -> MakeBook -> Multiformat -> Packaging;
    }
```
## Diagrams with Mermaid

Mermaid diagrams for flowcharts, sequences, and more:

```{mermaid}
flowchart LR
  A[Start] --> B{Decision}
  B -->|Yes| C[Process]
  B -->|No| D[Skip]
  C --> E[End]
  D --> E
```
